channel.title: Ring of fire -xbox 360
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m6Py8PQvQVw --editing by me (plane262)
lyrics:
love, my 360, better games than ps3, its xbox live that i desire, but then i got the ring of fire, and when i got that dreaded ring of fire, i called microsoft for repairs that i require, but i sat on hold, till i got tired, blinkin ring of fire
[i]hey, thanks for calling xbox customer support your call maybe monitered or recorded for quality purposes, wich console are you talking about?[/i]THE 360![i]I can see if someone can help you but 1st i need to check one thing. Please say original xbox or xbox 360[/i]360!
I cant stand that burning ring of fire, i called microsoft for repairs that i require, but I sat on hold, till i got tired, blinkin ring of fire.
Finally got, this guy named lee, he said repairs are free, i heard him say, to mishergrin(something like that) they ran out of boxes to melt them in.
so i still got this burning ring of fire, and i cant play gears yeh its really getting dired, and it burns burns burns, this ring of fire, this ring of fire.
[i]Say original xbox or press 1. Or a xbox360, press 2[/i]BEEP.[i]xbox360[/i]
yeh!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m6Py8PQvQVw --editing by me (plane262)

lyrics:

love, my 360,
better games than ps3,
its xbox live that i desire,
but then i got the ring of fire,
and when i got that dreaded ring of fire,
i called microsoft for repairs that i require,
but i sat on hold,
till i got tired,
blinkin ring of fire

hey, thanks for calling xbox customer support your call maybe monitered or recorded for quality purposes, wich console are you talking about?THE 360!I can see if someone can help you but 1st i need to check one thing. Please say original xbox or xbox 360360!

I cant stand that burning ring of fire,
i called microsoft for repairs that i require,
but I sat on hold,
till i got tired,
blinkin ring of fire.

Finally got, this guy named lee,
he said repairs are free,
i heard him say, to mishergrin(something like that)
they ran out of boxes to melt them in.

so i still got this burning ring of fire,
and i cant play gears yeh its really getting dired,
and it burns burns burns,
this ring of fire,
this ring of fire.

Say original xbox or press 1. Or a xbox360, press 2BEEP.xbox360

yeh!
